Basilica Guards.text:
Defender

Basilica Guards.original_text:
Defender
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

rulings.text: You may pay {W/B} a maximum of one time for each extort triggered ability. You decide whether to pay when the ability resolves.

The amount of life you gain from extort is based on the total amount of life lost, not necessarily the number of opponents you have. For example, if your opponent’s life total can’t change (perhaps because that player controls Platinum Emperion), you won’t gain any life.
The extort ability doesn’t target any player.

Gideon, Champion of Justice.name: Gideon, Champion of Justice
Gideon, Champion of Justice.text:
[+1]: Put a loyalty counter on Gideon, Champion of Justice for each creature target opponent controls.
[0]: Until end of turn, Gideon, Champion of Justice becomes a Human Soldier creature with power and toughness each equal to the number of loyalty counters on him and gains indestructible. He's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.
[−15]: Exile all other permanents.
Gideon, Champion of Justice.original_text:
+1: Put a loyalty counter on Gideon, Champion of Justice for each creature target opponent controls.
0: Until end of turn, Gideon, Champion of Justice becomes an indestructible Human Soldier creature with power and toughness each equal to the number of loyalty counters on him. He's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.
-15: Exile all other permanents.

rulings.text: If the first ability doesn’t resolve (perhaps because the target opponent is an illegal target when the ability tries to resolve), you won’t put any additional loyalty counters on Gideon, although the loyalty counter you put on him to activate the ability will remain.

If Gideon, Champion of Justice becomes a creature due to his second ability, that doesn’t count as having a creature enter the battlefield. Gideon was already on the battlefield; he only changed his types. Abilities that trigger whenever a creature enters the battlefield won’t trigger.

Gideon, Champion of Justice’s power and toughness are set to the number of loyalty counters on him when his second ability resolves. They won’t change later in the turn if the number of loyalty counters on him changes.

You put a loyalty counter on Gideon, Champion of Justice as part of the cost of activating the first ability. When that ability resolves, you count the number of creatures controlled by the target opponent and put that many additional loyalty counters on Gideon.

Gideon, Champion of Justice’s second ability causes him to become a creature with the creature types Human and Soldier. He remains a planeswalker with the planeswalker type Gideon. (He also retains any other card types or subtypes he may have had.) Each subtype is correlated to the proper card type: Gideon is just a planeswalker type (not a creature type), and Human and Soldier are just creature types (not planeswalker types).

Say you activate Gideon, Champion of Justice’s second ability, and then an opponent gains control of him before combat. You may have any of your creatures attack Gideon, Champion of Justice (since he’s still a planeswalker). Then Gideon, Champion of Justice may block (since he’s a creature). He may block any eligible attacking creature, including one that’s attacking him! During combat, he behaves as an attacked planeswalker and/or a blocking creature, as appropriate. For example, he deals combat damage to any creatures he’s blocking, but he doesn’t deal combat damage to any unblocked creatures that are attacking him.
If Gideon, Champion of Justice becomes a creature the same turn he enters the battlefield, you can’t attack with him or use any of his {T} abilities (if he gains any).

If damage that can’t be prevented is dealt to Gideon, Champion of Justice after his second ability has resolved, that damage will have all applicable results: specifically, the damage is marked on Gideon (since he’s a creature) and that damage causes that many loyalty counters to be removed from him (since he’s a planeswalker). Even though he has indestructible, if Gideon, Champion of Justice has no loyalty counters on him, he’s put into his owner’s graveyard as a state-based action.

rulings.text: You may pay {W/B} a maximum of one time for each extort triggered ability. You decide whether to pay when the ability resolves.

The amount of life you gain from extort is based on the total amount of life lost, not necessarily the number of opponents you have. For example, if your opponent’s life total can’t change (perhaps because that player controls Platinum Emperion), you won’t gain any life.
The extort ability doesn’t target any player.

Aetherize.name: Aetherize
Aetherize.text: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.
Aetherize.flavor: "You can come back once you've learned some manners—and figured out how to reconstitute your physical forms."
Aetherize.original_text: Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

rulings.text: An “attacking creature” is one that has been declared as an attacker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield attacking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be an attacking creature through the end of combat step, even if the player it was attacking has left the game, or the planeswalker it was attacking has left combat. There’s no such thing as an attacking creature outside of the combat phase.

Agoraphobia.name: Agoraphobia
Agoraphobia.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -5/-0.
{2}{U}: Return Agoraphobia to its owner's hand.
Agoraphobia.flavor: "Everyone in this city is choosing sides. I choose inside."
Agoraphobia.original_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -5/-0.
{2}{U}: Return Agoraphobia to its owner's hand.

rulings.text: Agoraphobia’s last ability can be activated only while it’s on the battlefield.
Only Agoraphobia’s controller can activate its last ability, no matter who controls the creature Agoraphobia’s attached to.

Players don’t have priority to cast spells and activate abilities between combat damage being assigned and being dealt. This means that if you want to return Agoraphobia to its owner’s hand before combat damage is dealt, you must do so before combat damage is assigned (and the creature will no longer get -5/-0).

Clinging Anemones.name: Clinging Anemones
Clinging Anemones.text:
Defender
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
Clinging Anemones.original_text:
Defender
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

rulings.text: When comparing the stats of the two creatures for evolve, you always compare power to power and toughness to toughness.

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, check its power and toughness against the power and toughness of the creature with evolve. If neither stat of the new creature is greater, evolve won’t trigger at all.

If evolve triggers, the stat comparison will happen again when the ability tries to resolve. If neither stat of the new creature is greater, the ability will do nothing. If the creature that entered the battlefield leaves the battlefield before evolve tries to resolve, use its last known power and toughness to compare the stats.

If a creature enters the battlefield with +1/+1 counters on it, consider those counters when determining if evolve will trigger. For example, a 1/1 creature that enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it will cause the evolve ability of a 2/2 creature to trigger.

If multiple creatures enter the battlefield at the same time, evolve may trigger multiple times, although the stat comparison will take place each time one of those abilities tries to resolve. For example, if you control a 2/2 creature with evolve and two 3/3 creatures enter the battlefield, evolve will trigger twice. The first ability will resolve and put a +1/+1 counter on the creature with evolve. When the second ability tries to resolve, neither the power nor the toughness of the new creature is greater than that of the creature with evolve, so that ability does nothing.

When comparing the stats as the evolve ability resolves, it’s possible that the stat that’s greater changes from power to toughness or vice versa. If this happens, the ability will still resolve and you’ll put a +1/+1 counter on the creature with evolve. For example, if you control a 2/2 creature with evolve and a 1/3 creature enters the battlefield under your control, it toughness is greater so evolve will trigger. In response, the 1/3 creature gets +2/-2. When the evolve trigger tries to resolve, its power is greater. You’ll put a +1/+1 counter on the creature with evolve.

Diluvian Primordial.name: Diluvian Primordial
Diluvian Primordial.text:
Flying

Diluvian Primordial.original_text:
Flying
When Diluvian Primordial enters the battlefield, for each opponent, you may cast up to one target instant or sorcery card from that player's graveyard without paying its mana cost. If a card cast this way would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: You can choose a number of targets up to the number of opponents you have, one target per opponent.
You cast the cards one at a time, choosing modes, targets and so on. The last card you cast will be the first one to resolve.
When casting an instant or sorcery card this way, ignore timing restrictions based on the card’s type. Other timing restrictions, such as “Cast [this card] only during combat,” must be followed.
If you can’t cast one of the target instant or sorcery cards, perhaps because there are no legal targets available, or if you choose not to cast one, it will remain in its owner’s graveyard.

If you cast a card “without paying its mana cost,” you can’t pay alternative costs such as overload costs. You can pay additional costs such as kicker costs. If the card has mandatory additional costs, you must pay those.
If a card has {X} in its mana cost, you must choose 0 as its value.
If an instant or sorcery card you cast this way is countered, it will still be exiled.

If you cast an instant or sorcery spell with cipher this way, you may exile the card encoded on a creature you control. If you can’t, or if you choose not to, the card will end up exiled but not encoded on a creature.

If an instant or sorcery card you cast this way goes to a zone other than exile or a graveyard, perhaps because one of its abilities says to put it into its owner’s hand, it won’t be exiled. This is true even if the card would be put into a graveyard later that turn.

Hands of Binding.name: Hands of Binding
Hands of Binding.text:
Tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)
Hands of Binding.original_text:
Tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

rulings.text: If the creature that was tapped by Hands of Binding is untapped during its controller’s next untap step (perhaps because a spell untapped it), Hands of Binding has no effect at that time. It won’t apply at some later time when the creature is tapped.
If a different player gains control of the creature that was tapped by Hands of Binding, Hands of Binding will stop that creature from untapping during its new controller’s next untap step.

If a creature with an encoded card deals combat damage to more than one player simultaneously (perhaps because some of the combat damage was redirected), the triggered ability will trigger once for each player it deals combat damage to. Each ability will create a copy of the exiled card and allow you to cast it.
If another player gains control of the creature, that player will control the triggered ability. That player will create a copy of the encoded card and may cast it.
This spell can target tapped creatures. If a targeted creature is already tapped when the spell resolves, that creature just remains tapped and doesn’t untap during its controller’s next untap step.

The spell with cipher is encoded on the creature as part of that spell’s resolution, just after the spell’s other effects. That card goes directly from the stack to exile. It never goes to the graveyard.

You choose the creature as the spell resolves. The cipher ability doesn’t target that creature, although the spell with cipher may target that creature (or a different creature) because of its other abilities.
If the spell with cipher doesn’t resolve, none of its effects will happen, including cipher. The card will go to its owner’s graveyard and won’t be encoded on a creature.
If the creature leaves the battlefield, the exiled card will no longer be encoded on any creature. It will stay exiled.

If you want to encode the card with cipher onto a noncreature permanent such as a Keyrune that can turn into a creature, that permanent has to be a creature before the spell with cipher starts resolving. You can choose only a creature to encode the card onto.
The copy of the card with cipher is created in and cast from exile.
You cast the copy of the card with cipher during the resolution of the triggered ability. Ignore timing restrictions based on the card’s type.

If you choose not to cast the copy, or you can’t cast it (perhaps because there are no legal targets available), the copy will cease to exist the next time state-based actions are performed. You won’t get a chance to cast the copy at a later time.

The exiled card with cipher grants a triggered ability to the creature it’s encoded on. If that creature loses that ability and subsequently deals combat damage to a player, the triggered ability won’t trigger. However, the exiled card will continue to be encoded on that creature.

foreign_names.name: Fesselnde Hände

Last Thoughts.name: Last Thoughts
Last Thoughts.text:
Draw a card.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)
Last Thoughts.original_text:
Draw a card.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

rulings.text: The spell with cipher is encoded on the creature as part of that spell’s resolution, just after the spell’s other effects. That card goes directly from the stack to exile. It never goes to the graveyard.

You choose the creature as the spell resolves. The cipher ability doesn’t target that creature, although the spell with cipher may target that creature (or a different creature) because of its other abilities.
If the spell with cipher doesn’t resolve, none of its effects will happen, including cipher. The card will go to its owner’s graveyard and won’t be encoded on a creature.
If the creature leaves the battlefield, the exiled card will no longer be encoded on any creature. It will stay exiled.

If you want to encode the card with cipher onto a noncreature permanent such as a Keyrune that can turn into a creature, that permanent has to be a creature before the spell with cipher starts resolving. You can choose only a creature to encode the card onto.
The copy of the card with cipher is created in and cast from exile.
You cast the copy of the card with cipher during the resolution of the triggered ability. Ignore timing restrictions based on the card’s type.

If you choose not to cast the copy, or you can’t cast it (perhaps because there are no legal targets available), the copy will cease to exist the next time state-based actions are performed. You won’t get a chance to cast the copy at a later time.

The exiled card with cipher grants a triggered ability to the creature it’s encoded on. If that creature loses that ability and subsequently deals combat damage to a player, the triggered ability won’t trigger. However, the exiled card will continue to be encoded on that creature.
If another player gains control of the creature, that player will control the triggered ability. That player will create a copy of the encoded card and may cast it.

If a creature with an encoded card deals combat damage to more than one player simultaneously (perhaps because some of the combat damage was redirected), the triggered ability will trigger once for each player it deals combat damage to. Each ability will create a copy of the exiled card and allow you to cast it.

foreign_names.flavor: "미로 자체가 환상인가? 아니면 양쪽 다 현실인가? 나도 이제 용처럼 미쳐가는구나." —제이스 벨레렌의 일지

foreign_names.name: Fantasma da Linha de Força
foreign_names.text: Quando Fantasma da Linha de Força causar dano de combate, devolva-o para a mão de seu dono. (Devolva-o apenas se ele tiver sobrevivido ao combate.)
foreign_names.flavor: "Será o próprio labirinto um fantasma? Ou um é tão real quanto o outro? Talvez eu esteja tão louco quanto o dragão."— Diário de Jace Beleren

foreign_names.name: Призрак Невидимых Лучей
foreign_names.text: Когда Призрак Невидимых Лучей наносит боевые повреждения, верните его в руку его владельца. (Возвращайте его, только если он выжил в бою.)
foreign_names.flavor: «Быть может, сам этот лабиринт — фантом? Или и то, и другое — реальность? Видать, я уже обезумел — как и дракон». — из дневника Джейса Белерена

foreign_names.name: 地脉幽魅
foreign_names.text: 当地脉幽魅造成战斗伤害时，将它移回其拥有者手上。（若它自战斗中存活，才将其移回手上。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「那迷宫本身就是一个幻象？还是如另一个迷宫般真实？也许我的心思跟龙王一样狂乱了。」 ～杰斯贝连的日记

foreign_names.name: 地脈幽魅
foreign_names.text: 當地脈幽魅造成戰鬥傷害時，將它移回其擁有者手上。（若它自戰鬥中存活，才將其移回手上。）
foreign_names.flavor: 「那迷宮本身就是一個幻象？還是如另一個迷宮般真實？也許我的心思跟龍王一樣狂亂了。」 ～傑斯貝連的日記

Metropolis Sprite.name: Metropolis Sprite
Metropolis Sprite.text:
Flying
{U}: Metropolis Sprite gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
Metropolis Sprite.flavor: "Well, if that goblin didn't want his tongue pierced, he shouldn't have stuck it out at me."
Metropolis Sprite.original_text:
Flying
{U}: Metropolis Sprite gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

foreign_names.name: Metrolopensylphide
foreign_names.text:
Fliegend
{U}: Die Metropolensylphide erhält +1/-1 bis zum Ende des Zuges.
foreign_names.flavor: „Tja, wenn dieser Goblin seine Zunge nicht durchbohrt haben wollte, hätte er sie mir nicht herausstrecken sollen."

foreign_names.name: Hada de la metrópolis
foreign_names.text: Vuela.{U}: El Hada de la metrópolis obtiene +1/-1 hasta el final del turno.
foreign_names.flavor: "En fin, si ese trasgo no quería que le agujereara la lengua, no me la hubiera sacado."

foreign_names.name: Farfadette de métropole
foreign_names.text:
Vol
{U} : La Farfadette de métropole gagne +1/-1 jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreign_names.flavor: « Ma foi, si ce gobelin ne voulait pas une langue fourchue, il n'avait qu'à pas me la tirer. »

foreign_names.name: Spiritella della Metropoli
foreign_names.text:
Volare
{U}: La Spiritella della Metropoli prende +1/-1 fino alla fine del turno.
foreign_names.flavor: "Beh, se quel goblin non mi avesse fatto le linguacce, la sua lingua ora non avrebbe un buco."

foreign_names.name: 大都市のスプライト
foreign_names.text: 飛行{U}：大都市のスプライトはターン終了時まで＋１/－１の修整を受ける。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — フェアリー・ならず者
foreign_names.flavor: 「あのゴブリンだって、舌を貫かれたくなかったなら、あたしにあかんべぇしなけりゃよかったのよ。」

foreign_names.name: 대도시 요정
foreign_names.text:
비행
{U}: 대도시 요정은 턴종료까지 +1/-1을 받는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "저 고블린이 혀에 구멍이 나서 불만이라고? 그럼 내앞에서 혀를 내밀지를 말던가."

foreign_names.name: Sílfide da Metrópole
foreign_names.text: Voar{U}: Sílfide da Metrópole recebe +1/-1 até o final do turno.
foreign_names.flavor: "Bem, se aquele goblin não queria ter a língua furada, não a deveria ter mostrado para mim."

foreign_names.name: Фея Мегаполиса
foreign_names.text:
Полет
{U}: Фея Мегаполиса получает +1/-1 до конца хода.
foreign_names.flavor: «Если этот гоблин не хотел, чтобы ему прокололи язык, не надо было его показывать».

foreign_names.name: 都会仙子
foreign_names.text:
飞行
{U}：都会仙子得+1/-1直到回合结束。
foreign_names.flavor: 「好吧，若那鬼怪不想自己的舌头被穿洞，先前就不该对我吐舌头。」

foreign_names.name: 都會仙子
foreign_names.text:
飛行
{U}：都會仙子得+1/-1直到回合結束。
foreign_names.flavor: 「好吧，若那鬼怪不想自己的舌頭被穿洞，先前就不該對我吐舌頭。」

Mindeye Drake.name: Mindeye Drake
Mindeye Drake.text:
Flying
When Mindeye Drake dies, target player mills five cards.
Mindeye Drake.flavor: They can map both the cityscape and the minds of its architects.
Mindeye Drake.original_text:
Flying
When Mindeye Drake dies, target player puts the top five cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

foreign_names.name: Seelenlesender Sceada
foreign_names.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Seelenlesende Sceada stirbt, legt ein Spieler deiner Wahl die obersten fünf Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.
foreign_names.flavor: Sie können sowohl das Stadtbild als auch das Denken seiner Architekten entschlüsseln.

foreign_names.name: Draco ojo mental
foreign_names.text: Vuela.Cuando el Draco ojo mental muera, el jugador objetivo pone las primeras cinco cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.
foreign_names.flavor: Pueden cartografiar tanto el trazado de la ciudad como las mentes de sus arquitectos.

foreign_names.name: Drakôn cérébrœil
foreign_names.text:
Vol
Quand le Drakôn cérébrœil meurt, le joueur ciblé met les cinq cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.
foreign_names.flavor: Il est à la fois capable de cartographier la ville et le cerveau de ses architectes.

foreign_names.name: Draghetto Occhio Mentale
foreign_names.text:
Volare
Quando il Draghetto Occhio Mentale muore, un giocatore bersaglio mette nel suo cimitero le prime cinque carte del suo grimorio.
foreign_names.flavor: Creano mappe sia della città, sia delle menti dei suoi architetti.

foreign_names.name: 心見のドレイク
foreign_names.text: 飛行心見のドレイクが死亡したとき、プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは、自分のライブラリーの一番上から５枚のカードを自分の墓地に置く。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ドレイク
foreign_names.flavor: 彼らは街並みと、その街の建築士たちの精神の両方を把握できる。

foreign_names.name: 심안 드레이크
foreign_names.text:
비행
심안 드레이크가 죽을 때, 플레이어 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 다섯 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.
foreign_names.flavor: 그들은 도시는 물론 도시를 설계한 사람의 마음까지도 훤히 내다본다.

foreign_names.name: Dragonete do Olho Mental
foreign_names.text: VoarQuando Dragonete do Olho Mental morre, o jogador alvo coloca os cinco cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério.
foreign_names.flavor: Eles são capazes de mapear tanto a paisagem urbana quanto a mente de seus arquitetos.

foreign_names.name: Мыслевидящий Дрейк
foreign_names.text:
Полет
Когда Мыслевидящий Дрейк умирает, целевой игрок кладет пять верхних карт своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.
foreign_names.flavor: Они могут составить карту как города, так и разума его архитекторов.

foreign_names.name: 灵眼龙兽
foreign_names.text:
飞行
当灵眼龙兽死去时，目标牌手将其牌库顶的五张牌置入其坟墓场。
foreign_names.flavor: 他们可以将城市景观和其建筑师的心思制成地图。

foreign_names.name: 靈眼龍獸
foreign_names.text:
飛行
當靈眼龍獸死去時，目標玩家將其牌庫頂的五張牌置入其墳墓場。
foreign_names.flavor: 他們可以將城市景觀和其建築師的心思製成地圖。

Rapid Hybridization.name: Rapid Hybridization
Rapid Hybridization.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller creates a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token.
Rapid Hybridization.flavor:
"We've merged your life essence with that of several creatures at once. You're welcome."
—Speaker Trifon
Rapid Hybridization.original_text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller puts a 3/3 green Frog Lizard creature token onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: If the creature is an illegal target when Rapid Hybridization tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. No Frog Lizard token will be created.
If Rapid Hybridization resolves and the creature isn’t destroyed (perhaps because it has indestructible), its controller will still get the Frog Lizard token.

foreign_names.name: Schnelle Hybridisierung
foreign_names.text: Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl. Sie kann nicht regeneriert werden. Der Beherrscher dieser Kreatur bringt einen 3/3 grünen (Frosch, Eidechse)-Kreaturenspielstein ins Spiel.
foreign_names.flavor: „Wir haben deine Lebensessenz mit der mehrerer Kreaturen gleichzeitig vermischt. Gern geschehen." —Sprecher Trifon

foreign_names.name: Hibridación rápida
foreign_names.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo. No puede ser regenerada. El controlador de esa criatura pone en el campo de batalla una ficha de criatura Lagarto Rana verde 3/3.
foreign_names.flavor: "Hemos fusionado tu esencia vital con la de varias criaturas a la vez. De nada."—Portavoz Trifón

foreign_names.name: Hybridation rapide
foreign_names.text: Détruisez une créature ciblée. Elle ne peut pas être régénérée. Le contrôleur de cette créature met sur le champ de bataille un jeton de créature 3/3 verte Grenouille et Lézard.
foreign_names.flavor: « Nous avons fusionné votre essence vitale avec celle de plusieurs autres créatures. Ne nous remerciez pas. » —Orateur Trifon

foreign_names.name: Ibridazione Rapida
foreign_names.text: Distruggi una creatura bersaglio. Non può essere rigenerata. Il controllore di quella creatura mette sul campo di battaglia una pedina creatura Lucertola Rana 3/3 verde.
foreign_names.flavor: "Abbiamo unito la tua essenza vitale a quella di diverse altre creature. Non c'è di che." —Oratore Trifon

foreign_names.name: 急速混成
foreign_names.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。それは再生できない。そのクリーチャーのコントローラーは、緑の３/３のカエル・トカゲ・クリーチャー・トークンを１体戦場に出す。
foreign_names.flavor: 「私達はお前の生命の本質を複数の生物のそれと一気に合体させたのだ。礼は言わんでいい。」――議長トリファン

foreign_names.name: 무분별한 혼종 생성
foreign_names.text: 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다. 그 생물은 재생될 수 없다. 그 생물의 조종자는 3/3 녹색 개구리 도마뱀 생물 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "네 생명의 정수를 다른 여러 생물의 것과 섞었지. 사례는 필요없어." —대변인 트리폰

foreign_names.name: Hibridação Veloz
foreign_names.text: Destrua a criatura alvo. Ela não pode ser regenerada. O controlador daquela criatura coloca no campo de batalha uma ficha de criatura verde 3/3 do tipo Sapo Lagarto.
foreign_names.flavor: "Fundimos sua essência vital com a de várias criaturas ao mesmo tempo. De nada."— Orador Trifon

foreign_names.name: Ускоренное Скрещивание
foreign_names.text: Уничтожьте целевое существо. Оно не может быть регенерировано. Контролирующий то существо игрок кладет на поле битвы одну фишку существа 3/3 зеленая Лягушка Ящер.
foreign_names.flavor: «Мы объединили твою жизненную сущность с сущностями еще нескольких существ. Можешь не благодарить». — Оратор Трефон

foreign_names.name: 顿成杂种
foreign_names.text: 消灭目标生物。它不能重生。该生物的操控者将一个3/3绿色蛙／蜥蜴衍生生物放进战场。
foreign_names.flavor: 「我们已经将你的生命精华和多个生物的生命精华同时融合。不用谢我。」 ～议长柴方

foreign_names.name: 頓成雜種
foreign_names.text: 消滅目標生物。它不能重生。該生物的操控者將一個3/3綠色蛙／蜥蜴衍生生物放進戰場。
foreign_names.flavor: 「我們已經將你的生命精華和多個生物的生命精華同時融合。不用謝我。」 ～議長柴方

Realmwright.name: Realmwright
Realmwright.text:
As Realmwright enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type.
Lands you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types.
Realmwright.flavor: There is not a single inch of Ravnica that hasn't been altered at one point or another to fit someone's whims.
Realmwright.original_text:
As Realmwright enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type.
Lands you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types.

rulings.text: The basic land types are Plains, Island, Swamp, Mountain, and Forest. Other land types, like Gate, aren’t basic lands types.
Lands you control will have the ability to tap for the color of mana corresponding to the chosen type. They’ll also retain any other abilities they have.

foreign_names.name: Reicheerschaffer
foreign_names.text:
Sowie der Reicheerschaffer ins Spiel kommt, bestimme einen Standardlandtyp.
Länder, die du kontrollierst, haben zusätzlich zu ihren anderen Typen den bestimmten Typ.
foreign_names.flavor: Es gibt keinen einzigen Zoll Boden in Ravnica, der nicht irgendwann einmal nach irgendjemandes Wünschen verändert worden wäre.

foreign_names.name: Cambiapaisaje
foreign_names.text: En cuanto el Cambiapaisaje entre al campo de batalla, elige un tipo de tierra básica.Las tierras que controlas son del tipo elegido además de sus otros tipos.
foreign_names.flavor: No hay un centímetro de Rávnica que no haya sido alterado en uno u otro momento para satisfacer los caprichos de alguien.

foreign_names.name: Forgeroyaume
foreign_names.text:
Au moment où le Forgeroyaume arrive sur le champ de bataille, choisissez un type de terrain de base.
Les terrains que vous contrôlez ont le type choisi en plus de leurs autres types.
foreign_names.flavor: Il n'est pas un centimètre carré de Ravnica qui n'ait été, à un moment ou un autre, modifié sur un coup de tête.

foreign_names.name: Forgiareami
foreign_names.text:
Mentre il Forgiareami entra nel campo di battaglia, scegli un tipo di terra base.
Le terre che controlli hanno il tipo scelto in aggiunta ai loro altri tipi.
foreign_names.flavor: Non vi è centimetro di Ravnica che non sia stato alterato a un certo punto per venire incontro ai capricci di qualcuno.

foreign_names.name: 領域大工
foreign_names.text: 領域大工が戦場に出るに際し、基本土地タイプを１つ選ぶ。あなたがコントロールする土地は、自身の他のタイプに加えてその選ばれたタイプでもある。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ヴィダルケン・ウィザード
foreign_names.flavor: ラヴニカの土地の中で、誰かの気まぐれによって変質させられたことがまったくない土地など一片たりとも存在しない。

foreign_names.name: 영역의 장인
foreign_names.text:
영역의 장인이 전장에 들어올 때, 기본 대지 유형 한 가지를 정한다.
당신이 조종하는 대지는 자신의 다른 유형에 더불어 당신이 선택한 유형이다.
foreign_names.flavor: 라브니카는 차원 전체가 시민들의 변덕으로 인해 변이되어 왔다.

foreign_names.name: Forjador de Realidade
foreign_names.text: Conforme Forjador de Realidade entra no campo de batalha, escolha um tipo de terreno básico.Os terrenos que você controla são do tipo escolhido além de seus outros tipos.
foreign_names.flavor: Não há um centímetro sequer de Ravnica que não tenha sido alterado em um momento ou outro para se adequar aos caprichos de alguém.

foreign_names.name: Создатель Владений
foreign_names.text:
При выходе Создателя Владений на поле битвы выберите тип базовой земли.
Земли под вашим контролем обладают выбранным типом в дополнение к своим другим типам.
foreign_names.flavor: В Равнике нет ни пяди земли, которая в какой-то момент не была бы перекроена по чьему-нибудь капризу.

foreign_names.name: 地境艺匠
foreign_names.text:
于地境艺匠进战场时，选择一个基本地类别。
由你操控的地均额外具有该类别。
foreign_names.flavor: 拉尼卡的每一寸土地都曾经因为某人的一时兴起而遭改变。

foreign_names.name: 地境藝匠
foreign_names.text:
當地境藝匠進戰場時，選擇一個基本地類別。
由你操控的地均額外具有該類別。
foreign_names.flavor: 拉尼卡的每一寸土地都曾經因為某人的一時興起而遭改變。

Sage's Row Denizen.name: Sage's Row Denizen
Sage's Row Denizen.text: Whenever another blue creature enters the battlefield under your control, target player mills two cards.
Sage's Row Denizen.flavor: "I offer you wisdom untainted by false loyalty, learning free of any guild's agenda."
Sage's Row Denizen.original_text: Whenever another blue creature enters the battlefield under your control, target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

foreign_names.name: Bewohner der Gasse der Weisen
foreign_names.text: Immer wenn eine andere blaue Kreatur unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, legt ein Spieler deiner Wahl die obersten beiden Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.
foreign_names.flavor: „Ich biete dir Weisheit frei von falscher Loyalität und Wissen, das nicht den Zielen irgendeiner Gilde dient."

foreign_names.name: Habitante de la Calle del Sabio
foreign_names.text: Siempre que otra criatura azul entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, el jugador objetivo pone las primeras dos cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.
foreign_names.flavor: "Te ofrezco sabiduría sin la mancha de la falsa lealtad, un aprendizaje ajeno a los planes de cualquier gremio."

foreign_names.name: Habitant du rang du Sage
foreign_names.text: À chaque fois qu'une autre créature bleue arrive le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, le joueur ciblé met les deux cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.
foreign_names.flavor: « Je vous propose une sagesse exempte de loyauté factice, un apprentissage libre de toute menée des guildes. »

foreign_names.name: Abitante di Viale della Saggezza
foreign_names.text: Ogniqualvolta un'altra creatura blu entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, un giocatore bersaglio mette nel suo cimitero le prime due carte del suo grimorio.
foreign_names.flavor: "Ti offro saggezza non contaminata da una falsa fedeltà, apprendimento libero dai secondi fini delle gilde."

foreign_names.name: 賢者街の住人
foreign_names.text: 他の青のクリーチャーが１体あなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーは、自分のライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを自分の墓地に置く。
foreign_names.type: クリーチャー — ヴィダルケン・ウィザード
foreign_names.flavor: 「まやかしの忠誠に穢されていない知恵を、どのギルドの企みにも縛られない学びを、お前に与えよう。」

foreign_names.name: 현자의 거리 거주민
foreign_names.text: 당신의 조종하에 다른 청색 생물이 전장에 들어올 때마다, 플레이어 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 두 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "가식적인 충성심이나 길드의 영향으로부터 자유로운 순수한 지혜를 주겠네"

foreign_names.name: Habitante da Travessa dos Sábios
foreign_names.text: Toda vez que outra criatura azul entra no campo de batalha sob o seu controle, o jogador alvo coloca os dois cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério.
foreign_names.flavor: "Eu lhe ofereço uma sabedoria imaculada pela falsa lealdade, um aprendizado livre da agenda de qualquer guilda."

foreign_names.name: Житель Ряда Мудрецов
foreign_names.text: Каждый раз, когда другое синее существо выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, целевой игрок кладет две верхние карты своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.
foreign_names.flavor: «Я предлагаю вам мудрость, не запятнанную ложной верностью, и знания, свободные от влияния гильдий».

foreign_names.name: 智者街居民
foreign_names.text: 每当另一个蓝色生物在你的操控下进战场时，目标牌手将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。

Simic Fluxmage.name: Simic Fluxmage
Simic Fluxmage.text:
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
{1}{U}, {T}: Move a +1/+1 counter from Simic Fluxmage onto target creature.
Simic Fluxmage.original_text:
Evolve (Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)
{1}{U}, {T}: Move a +1/+1 counter from Simic Fluxmage onto target creature.

rulings.text: If the creature is an illegal target when Simic Fluxmage’s ability tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. No counters will be removed from Simic Fluxmage.

To move a counter from one creature to another, the counter is removed from the first creature and placed on the second. Any abilities that care about a counter being placed on the second creature will apply.

When comparing the stats as the evolve ability resolves, it’s possible that the stat that’s greater changes from power to toughness or vice versa. If this happens, the ability will still resolve and you’ll put a +1/+1 counter on the creature with evolve. For example, if you control a 2/2 creature with evolve and a 1/3 creature enters the battlefield under your control, it toughness is greater so evolve will trigger. In response, the 1/3 creature gets +2/-2. When the evolve trigger tries to resolve, its power is greater. You’ll put a +1/+1 counter on the creature with evolve.

If a creature enters the battlefield with +1/+1 counters on it, consider those counters when determining if evolve will trigger. For example, a 1/1 creature that enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it will cause the evolve ability of a 2/2 creature to trigger.

If multiple creatures enter the battlefield at the same time, evolve may trigger multiple times, although the stat comparison will take place each time one of those abilities tries to resolve. For example, if you control a 2/2 creature with evolve and two 3/3 creatures enter the battlefield, evolve will trigger twice. The first ability will resolve and put a +1/+1 counter on the creature with evolve. When the second ability tries to resolve, neither the power nor the toughness of the new creature is greater than that of the creature with evolve, so that ability does nothing.
When comparing the stats of the two creatures for evolve, you always compare power to power and toughness to toughness.

Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, check its power and toughness against the power and toughness of the creature with evolve. If neither stat of the new creature is greater, evolve won’t trigger at all.

If evolve triggers, the stat comparison will happen again when the ability tries to resolve. If neither stat of the new creature is greater, the ability will do nothing. If the creature that entered the battlefield leaves the battlefield before evolve tries to resolve, use its last known power and toughness to compare the stats.

rulings.text: The power of the target creature is checked both as you target it and as the ability resolves. If the power of the target creature when the ability resolves is greater than the number of +1/+1 counters removed from Simic Manipulator, the ability won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t gain control of any creature, but the counters removed as a cost remain removed.

If evolve triggers, the stat comparison will happen again when the ability tries to resolve. If neither stat of the new creature is greater, the ability will do nothing. If the creature that entered the battlefield leaves the battlefield before evolve tries to resolve, use its last known power and toughness to compare the stats.

In response, the 1/3 creature gets +2/-2. When the evolve trigger tries to resolve, its power is greater. You’ll put a +1/+1 counter on the creature with evolve.

Skygames.name: Skygames
Skygames.text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery."
Skygames.flavor: Both Boros and Azorius scout the games in hopes of recruiting the finest athletes.
Skygames.original_text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land has "{T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery."

foreign_names.name: Himmelsspiele
foreign_names.text:
Landverzauberung
Das verzauberte Land hat „{T}: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält Flugfähigkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur zu einem Zeitpunkt, zu dem du auch eine Hexerei wirken könntest."
foreign_names.flavor: Sowohl die Boros als auch die Azorius verfolgen die Spiele in der Hoffnung, die besten Athleten zu rekrutieren.

foreign_names.name: Juegos aéreos
foreign_names.text: Encantar tierra.La tierra encantada tiene "{T}: La criatura objetivo gana la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno. Activa esta habilidad solo cuando puedas lanzar un conjuro".
foreign_names.flavor: Tanto los boros como los azorios observan los juegos con la esperanza de reclutar a los mejores atletas.

foreign_names.name: Jeux célestes
foreign_names.text:
Enchanter : terrain
Le terrain enchanté a « {T} : La créature ciblée acquiert le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour. N'activez cette capacité que lorsque vous pourriez lancer un rituel. »
foreign_names.flavor: Boros et Azorius épient les jeux dans l'espoir de recruter les meilleurs athlètes.

foreign_names.name: Giochi Aerei
foreign_names.text:
Incanta terra
La terra incantata ha "{T}: Una creatura bersaglio ha volare fino alla fine del turno. Attiva questa abilità solo quando potresti lanciare una stregoneria".
foreign_names.flavor: Sia i Boros che gli Azorius osservano i giochi, nella speranza di reclutare i migliori atleti.

foreign_names.name: 天空試合
foreign_names.text: エンチャント（土地）エンチャントされている土地は「{T}：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで飛行を得る。この能力は、あなたがソーサリーを唱えられるときにのみ起動できる。」を持つ。
foreign_names.type: エンチャント — オーラ
foreign_names.flavor: ボロスもアゾリウスも、最高の競技者を採用したいという望みから競技を偵察している。

foreign_names.name: 하늘경기
foreign_names.text:
대지에게 부여
부여된 대지는 "{T}: 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 비행 능력을 얻는다."라는 능력을 가진다. 당신이 집중마법을 발동할 수 있는 시기에만 이 능력을 활성화할 수 있다.
foreign_names.flavor: 보로스와 아조리우스 길드는 공히 하늘경기를 주시하며 일류 선수들을 영입하려 한다.

foreign_names.name: Jogos Aéreos
foreign_names.text: Encantar terrenoO terreno encantado tem "{T}: A criatura alvo ganha voar até o final do turno. Ative esta habilidade somente nos momentos em que poderia conjurar um feitiço."
foreign_names.flavor: Tanto os Boros quanto os Azorius observam os jogos na esperança de recrutar os melhores atletas.

foreign_names.name: Небесные Игры
foreign_names.text:
Зачаровать землю
Зачарованная земля имеет способность «{T}: целевое существо получает Полет до конца хода. Активируйте эту способность только при возможности разыгрывать волшебство».
foreign_names.flavor: И Боросы, и Азориусы внимательно наблюдают за играми, рассчитывая завербовать самых сильных и ловких в свои ряды.

foreign_names.name: 舞空竞赛
foreign_names.text:
结附于地
所结附的地具有「{T}：目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。你只可以于你能施放法术的时机下起动此异能。」
foreign_names.flavor: 波洛斯和俄佐立都在观察比赛，希望招募最优秀的运动员。

foreign_names.name: 舞空競賽
foreign_names.text:
結附於地
所結附的地具有「{T}：目標生物獲得飛行異能直到回合結束。你只可以於你能施放巫術的時機下起動此異能。」
foreign_names.flavor: 波洛斯和俄佐立都在觀察比賽，希望招募最優秀的運動員。

Spell Rupture.name: Spell Rupture
Spell Rupture.text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
Spell Rupture.flavor:
"Like water, mana will drain from an inferior vessel."
—Jalan Tosk, Simic forcemage
Spell Rupture.original_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.

rulings.text: The value of X is the greatest power among creatures you control when Spell Rupture resolves. If you control no creatures at that time, X will be 0. The target spell’s controller can choose to pay {0} (simply by indicating they wish to do so). That player can also choose to not pay {0} and the spell will be countered.

foreign_names.name: Zerberstender Zauber
foreign_names.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl, falls sein Beherrscher nicht {X} zahlt, wobei X die höchste Stärke unter den Kreaturen ist, die du kontrollierst.
foreign_names.flavor: „Wie Wasser läuft auch Mana aus einem minderwertigen Gefäß aus." —Jalan Tosk, Simic-Kraftmagier

foreign_names.name: Ruptura del hechizo
foreign_names.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo a menos que su controlador pague {X}, donde X es igual a la mayor fuerza entre las criaturas que controlas.
foreign_names.flavor: "El maná, como ocurre con el agua, gotea de los recipientes inferiores."—Jalan Tosc, magofuerza simic

foreign_names.name: Rupture de sort
foreign_names.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé à moins que son contrôleur ne paie {X}, X étant la force la plus élevée parmi les créatures que vous contrôlez.
foreign_names.flavor: « Tout comme l'eau, le mana s'écoule des contenants poreux. » —Jalan Tosk, mageforce de Simic

foreign_names.name: Frattura Magica
foreign_names.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio a meno che il suo controllore non paghi {X}, dove X è la forza maggiore tra le creature che controlli.
foreign_names.flavor: "Come l'acqua, il mana non può essere contenuto da un recipiente inadeguato." —Jalan Tosk, mago della forza Simic

foreign_names.name: 呪文裂き
foreign_names.text: 呪文１つを対象とする。それのコントローラーが{X}を支払わないかぎり、それを打ち消す。Ｘはあなたがコントロールするクリーチャーの中のパワーの最大値に等しい。
foreign_names.flavor: 「水と同じで、マナもお粗末な器からは漏れ出てしまうのだ。」――シミックの腕力魔道士、ジェイラン・トスク

foreign_names.name: 주문 파열
foreign_names.text: 주문 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 주문의 조종자가 {X}를 지불하지 않으면 그 주문을 무효화한다. X는 당신이 조종하는 생물 중 공격력이 가장 높은 생물의 공격력과 같다.
foreign_names.flavor: "마나도 그릇이 부실하면 물처럼 새기 마련이다." —시믹 완력술사 제일란 토스크

foreign_names.name: Ruptura de Mágica
foreign_names.text: Anule a mágica alvo a menos que seu controlador pague {X}, sendo X o maior poder entre as criaturas que você controla.
foreign_names.flavor: "Assim como a água, o mana vazará de um recipiente de qualidade inferior."— Jalan Tosk, Mago da Força Simic

foreign_names.name: Разрыв Заклинания
foreign_names.text: Отмените целевое заклинание, если только контролирующий его игрок не заплатит {X}, где X — наибольшее значение силы среди существ под вашим контролем.
foreign_names.flavor: «Как и воду, ману не удержать в сосуде, если он прохудился». — Джейлан Тоск, природомаг Симиков

foreign_names.name: 咒语破裂
foreign_names.text: 除非目标咒语的操控者支付{X}，否则反击该咒语，X为由你操控的生物中力量最大者的数值。
foreign_names.flavor: 「法术力就像水一样，会从不够好的容器流失。」 ～析米克力法师贾兰托斯

foreign_names.name: 咒語破裂
foreign_names.text: 除非目標咒語的操控者支付{X}，否則反擊該咒語，X為由你操控的生物中力量最大者的數值。
foreign_names.flavor: 「魔法力就像水一樣，會從不夠好的容器流失。」 ～析米克力法師賈蘭托斯

Stolen Identity.name: Stolen Identity
Stolen Identity.text:
Create a token that's a copy of target artifact or creature.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)
Stolen Identity.original_text:
Put a token onto the battlefield that's a copy of target artifact or creature.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

rulings.text: If the token you create is a copy of a creature, you can exile Stolen Identity encoded on that token.

The token copies exactly what was printed on the original artifact or creature and nothing else (unless that permanent is copying something else or is a token; see below). It doesn’t copy whether it is tapped or untapped, whether it has any counters on it or Auras and Equipment attached to it, or any non-copy effects that have changed its power, toughness, types, color, or so on.
If the copied permanent has {X} in its mana cost, X is considered to be zero.
If the copied permanent is copying something else (for example, if the copied creature is a Clone), then the token enters the battlefield as whatever that creature copied.

Any enters-the-battlefield abilities of the copied permanent will trigger when the token enters the battlefield. Any “as [this permanent] enters the battlefield” or “[this permanent] enters the battlefield with” abilities of the chosen permanent will also work.
If the copied permanent is a token, the token that’s created copies the original characteristics of that token as stated by the effect that put the token onto the battlefield.

If a creature with an encoded card deals combat damage to more than one player simultaneously (perhaps because some of the combat damage was redirected), the triggered ability will trigger once for each player it deals combat damage to. Each ability will create a copy of the exiled card and allow you to cast it.

If you want to encode the card with cipher onto a noncreature permanent such as a Keyrune that can turn into a creature, that permanent has to be a creature before the spell with cipher starts resolving. You can choose only a creature to encode the card onto.
The copy of the card with cipher is created in and cast from exile.
You cast the copy of the card with cipher during the resolution of the triggered ability. Ignore timing restrictions based on the card’s type.

If you choose not to cast the copy, or you can’t cast it (perhaps because there are no legal targets available), the copy will cease to exist the next time state-based actions are performed. You won’t get a chance to cast the copy at a later time.

The exiled card with cipher grants a triggered ability to the creature it’s encoded on. If that creature loses that ability and subsequently deals combat damage to a player, the triggered ability won’t trigger. However, the exiled card will continue to be encoded on that creature.
If another player gains control of the creature, that player will control the triggered ability. That player will create a copy of the encoded card and may cast it.

The spell with cipher is encoded on the creature as part of that spell’s resolution, just after the spell’s other effects. That card goes directly from the stack to exile. It never goes to the graveyard.

You choose the creature as the spell resolves. The cipher ability doesn’t target that creature, although the spell with cipher may target that creature (or a different creature) because of its other abilities.
If the spell with cipher doesn’t resolve, none of its effects will happen, including cipher. The card will go to its owner’s graveyard and won’t be encoded on a creature.
If the creature leaves the battlefield, the exiled card will no longer be encoded on any creature. It will stay exiled.

foreign_names.name: Gestohlene Identität
foreign_names.text:
Bringe einen Spielstein ins Spiel, der eine Kopie eines Artefaktes oder einer Kreatur deiner Wahl ist.
Chiffrieren (Dann kannst du diese Zauberspruchkarte auf eine Kreatur codiert, die du kontrollierst, ins Exil schicken. Immer wenn diese Kreatur einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, kann ihr Beherrscher eine Kopie der codierten Karte wirken, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen.)

foreign_names.name: Identidad usurpada
foreign_names.text: Pon en el campo de batalla una ficha que es una copia de la criatura o artefacto objetivo.Cifrar. (Luego puedes exiliar esta carta de hechizo, cifrándola en una criatura que controles. Siempre que esa criatura haga daño de combate a un jugador, su controlador puede lanzar una copia de la carta cifrada sin pagar su coste de maná.)

foreign_names.name: Vol d'identité
foreign_names.text:
Mettez sur le champ de bataille un jeton qui est une copie d'un artefact ciblé ou d'une créature ciblée.
Cryptage (Vous pouvez ensuite exiler cette carte de sort cryptée sur une créature que vous contrôlez. À chaque fois que cette créature inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, son contrôleur peut lancer une copie de la carte cryptée sans payer son coût de mana.)

foreign_names.name: Identità Rubata
foreign_names.text:
Metti sul campo di battaglia una pedina che è una copia di un artefatto o di una creatura bersaglio.
Cifrare (Poi puoi esiliare questa carta magia codificata su una creatura che controlli. Ogniqualvolta quella creatura infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, il suo controllore può lanciare una copia della carta codificata senza pagare il suo costo di mana.)

foreign_names.name: 身分詐称
foreign_names.text: アーティファクト１つかクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それのコピーであるトークンを１つ戦場に出す。暗号（その後、あなたはあなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体に暗号化した状態で、この呪文カードを追放してもよい。そのクリーチャーがプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、あなたはその暗号化したカードのコピーを、それのマナ・コストを支払うことなく唱えてもよい。）

foreign_names.name: 빼앗긴 정체성
foreign_names.text:
마법물체나 생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 마법물체나 생물의 복사본인 토큰 한 개를 전장에 놓는다.
암호문 (그런 다음 당신은 이 주문 카드를 추방하고 당신이 조종하는 생물 한 개에 암호화할 수 있다. 그 생물이 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 그 생물의 조종자는 암호화한 카드의 복사본을 마나비용의 지불 없이 발동할 수 있다.)

foreign_names.name: Identidade Roubada
foreign_names.text: Coloque no campo de batalha uma ficha que seja uma cópia do artefato ou criatura alvo.Cifrar (Depois, você pode exilar este card de mágica cifrado numa criatura que você controla. Toda vez que aquela criatura causar dano de combate a um jogador, seu controlador poderá conjurar uma cópia do card cifrado sem pagar seu custo de mana.)

foreign_names.name: Украденная Личность
foreign_names.text:
Положите на поле битвы одну фишку, являющуюся копией целевого артефакта или существа.
Шифр (Затем вы можете изгнать эту карту заклинания, закодировав ее на существе под вашим контролем. Каждый раз, когда то существо наносит боевые повреждения игроку, контролирующий его игрок может разыграть копию закодированной карты без уплаты ее мана-стоимости.)

foreign_names.name: 身分遭窃
foreign_names.text:
将一个衍生物放进战场，此衍生物为目标神器或生物的复制品。
暗码（然后你可以放逐此咒语牌，并赋码于一个由你操控的生物上。每当该生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，其操控者可以施放所赋码之牌的复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。）

foreign_names.name: 身分遭竊
foreign_names.text:
將一個衍生物放進戰場，此衍生物為目標神器或生物之複製品。
暗碼（然後你可以放逐此咒語牌，並賦碼於一個由你操控的生物上。每當該生物對任一玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，其操控者可以施放所賦碼之牌的複製品，且不需支付其魔法力費用。）

Totally Lost.name: Totally Lost
Totally Lost.text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.
Totally Lost.original_text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

foreign_names.name: Gänzlich verlaufen
foreign_names.text: Lege eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl, die kein Land ist, oben auf die Bibliothek ihres Besitzers.
foreign_names.flavor: Fblzzp konnte Menschenmassen noch nie leiden.

foreign_names.name: Perdido por completo
foreign_names.text: Pon el permanente objetivo que no sea tierra en la parte superior de la biblioteca de su propietario.
foreign_names.flavor: Fblthp siempre había odiado las multitudes.

foreign_names.name: Complètement perdu
foreign_names.text: Mettez le permanent non-terrain ciblé au-dessus de la bibliothèque de son propriétaire.
foreign_names.flavor: Fblthp avait toujours eu la foule en horreur.

foreign_names.name: Completamente Perso
foreign_names.text: Metti un permanente non terra bersaglio in cima al grimorio del suo proprietario.
foreign_names.flavor: Fblthp ha sempre odiato la folla.

foreign_names.name: 道迷い
foreign_names.text: 土地でないパーマネント１つを対象とし、それをオーナーのライブラリーの一番上に置く。
foreign_names.flavor: フブルスプは昔から人ごみが嫌いだった。

foreign_names.name: 난 누군가 또 여긴 어딘가
foreign_names.text: 대지가 아닌 지속물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 지속물을 소유자의 서고 맨 위에 놓는다.
foreign_names.flavor: 쁥뜳은 원래 사람 많은 곳이 싫었다.

foreign_names.name: Totalmente Perdido
foreign_names.text: Coloque a permanente alvo que não seja um terreno no topo do grimório de seu dono.
foreign_names.flavor: Fblthp sempre odiou multidões.

foreign_names.name: Окончательно Заблудившийся
foreign_names.text: Положите целевой не являющийся землей перманент на верх библиотеки его владельца.
foreign_names.flavor: Фыблтып всегда ненавидел толпы.

foreign_names.name: 完全迷途
foreign_names.text: 将目标非地永久物置于其拥有者的牌库顶。
foreign_names.flavor: 夫毕佐向来讨厌群众。

foreign_names.name: 完全迷途
foreign_names.text: 將目標非地永久物置於其擁有者的牌庫頂。
foreign_names.flavor: 夫畢佐向來討厭群眾。

Voidwalk.name: Voidwalk
Voidwalk.text:
Exile target creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)
Voidwalk.original_text:
Exile target creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

rulings.text: The spell with cipher is encoded on the creature as part of that spell’s resolution, just after the spell’s other effects. That card goes directly from the stack to exile. It never goes to the graveyard.

You choose the creature as the spell resolves. The cipher ability doesn’t target that creature, although the spell with cipher may target that creature (or a different creature) because of its other abilities.
If the spell with cipher doesn’t resolve, none of its effects will happen, including cipher. The card will go to its owner’s graveyard and won’t be encoded on a creature.
If the creature leaves the battlefield, the exiled card will no longer be encoded on any creature. It will stay exiled.

If you want to encode the card with cipher onto a noncreature permanent such as a Keyrune that can turn into a creature, that permanent has to be a creature before the spell with cipher starts resolving. You can choose only a creature to encode the card onto.
The copy of the card with cipher is created in and cast from exile.
You cast the copy of the card with cipher during the resolution of the triggered ability. Ignore timing restrictions based on the card’s type.

If you choose not to cast the copy, or you can’t cast it (perhaps because there are no legal targets available), the copy will cease to exist the next time state-based actions are performed. You won’t get a chance to cast the copy at a later time.

The exiled card with cipher grants a triggered ability to the creature it’s encoded on. If that creature loses that ability and subsequently deals combat damage to a player, the triggered ability won’t trigger. However, the exiled card will continue to be encoded on that creature.
If another player gains control of the creature, that player will control the triggered ability. That player will create a copy of the encoded card and may cast it.

If a creature with an encoded card deals combat damage to more than one player simultaneously (perhaps because some of the combat damage was redirected), the triggered ability will trigger once for each player it deals combat damage to. Each ability will create a copy of the exiled card and allow you to cast it.

foreign_names.name: Wanderleere
foreign_names.text:
Schicke eine Kreatur deiner Wahl ins Exil. Bringe sie zu Beginn des nächsten Endsegments unter der Kontrolle ihres Besitzers ins Spiel zurück.
Chiffrieren (Dann kannst du diese Zauberspruchkarte auf eine Kreatur codiert, die du kontrollierst, ins Exil schicken. Immer wenn diese Kreatur einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, kann ihr Beherrscher eine Kopie der codierten Karte wirken, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen.)

foreign_names.name: Paseo por el vacío
foreign_names.text: Exilia la criatura objetivo. Regrésala al campo de batalla bajo el control de su propietario al comienzo del próximo paso final.Cifrar. (Luego puedes exiliar esta carta de hechizo, cifrándola en una criatura que controles. Siempre que esa criatura haga daño de combate a un jugador, su controlador puede lanzar una copia de la carta cifrada sin pagar su coste de maná.)

foreign_names.name: Marchenéant
foreign_names.text:
Exilez la créature ciblée. Renvoyez-la sur le champ de bataille sous le contrôle de son propriétaire au début de la prochaine étape de fin.
Cryptage (Vous pouvez ensuite exiler cette carte de sort cryptée sur une créature que vous contrôlez. À chaque fois que cette créature inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, son contrôleur peut lancer une copie de la carte cryptée sans payer son coût de mana.)

foreign_names.name: Solcavuoto
foreign_names.text:
Esilia una creatura bersaglio. Rimettila sul campo di battaglia sotto il controllo del suo proprietario all'inizio della prossima sottofase finale.

rulings.text: The extort ability doesn’t target any player.
You may pay {W/B} a maximum of one time for each extort triggered ability. You decide whether to pay when the ability resolves.

The amount of life you gain from extort is based on the total amount of life lost, not necessarily the number of opponents you have. For example, if your opponent’s life total can’t change (perhaps because that player controls Platinum Emperion), you won’t gain any life.

Contaminated Ground.name: Contaminated Ground
Contaminated Ground.text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a Swamp.
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.
Contaminated Ground.flavor:
"No one cares about pollution until they can see it."
—Gurras, Golgari rot farmer
Contaminated Ground.original_text:
Enchant land
Enchanted land is a Swamp.
Whenever enchanted land becomes tapped, its controller loses 2 life.

rulings.text: The enchanted land loses its existing land types and any abilities printed on it. It now has the land type Swamp and has the ability to tap to add {B} to its controller’s mana pool. Contaminated Ground doesn’t change the enchanted land’s name or whether it’s legendary, basic, or snow.
Contaminated Ground’s last ability triggers whenever the enchanted land becomes tapped for any reason, not just when it’s tapped for mana.

If, while casting a spell or activating an ability, the enchanted land’s controller taps the land for mana to pay for it, Contaminated Ground’s ability triggers and goes on the stack on top of that spell or ability. Contaminated Ground’s ability will resolve first.

On the other hand, the enchanted land’s controller may tap the land for mana, let Contaminated Ground’s ability trigger and go on the stack, then spend that mana to cast an instant or activate an ability in response. In that case, that instant or ability will resolve first.

Crypt Ghast.name: Crypt Ghast
Crypt Ghast.text:
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)

Crypt Ghast.original_text:
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {WB}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add {B} to your mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

rulings.text: You may pay {W/B} a maximum of one time for each extort triggered ability. You decide whether to pay when the ability resolves.

The amount of life you gain from extort is based on the total amount of life lost, not necessarily the number of opponents you have. For example, if your opponent’s life total can’t change (perhaps because that player controls Platinum Emperion), you won’t gain any life.
The extort ability doesn’t target any player.

Flying

飞行

foreign_names.name: 虛空領主
foreign_names.text:
飛行
每當虛空領主對任一玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，放逐該玩家牌庫頂的七張牌，然後將其中一張生物牌在你的操控下放進戰場。

Mental Vapors.name: Mental Vapors
Mental Vapors.text:
Target player discards a card.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)
Mental Vapors.original_text:
Target player discards a card.
Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

rulings.text: The spell with cipher is encoded on the creature as part of that spell’s resolution, just after the spell’s other effects. That card goes directly from the stack to exile. It never goes to the graveyard.

You choose the creature as the spell resolves. The cipher ability doesn’t target that creature, although the spell with cipher may target that creature (or a different creature) because of its other abilities.
If the spell with cipher doesn’t resolve, none of its effects will happen, including cipher. The card will go to its owner’s graveyard and won’t be encoded on a creature.
If the creature leaves the battlefield, the exiled card will no longer be encoded on any creature. It will stay exiled.

If you want to encode the card with cipher onto a noncreature permanent such as a Keyrune that can turn into a creature, that permanent has to be a creature before the spell with cipher starts resolving. You can choose only a creature to encode the card onto.
The copy of the card with cipher is created in and cast from exile.
You cast the copy of the card with cipher during the resolution of the triggered ability. Ignore timing restrictions based on the card’s type.

If you choose not to cast the copy, or you can’t cast it (perhaps because there are no legal targets available), the copy will cease to exist the next time state-based actions are performed. You won’t get a chance to cast the copy at a later time.

The exiled card with cipher grants a triggered ability to the creature it’s encoded on. If that creature loses that ability and subsequently deals combat damage to a player, the triggered ability won’t trigger. However, the exiled card will continue to be encoded on that creature.
If another player gains control of the creature, that player will control the triggered ability. That player will create a copy of the encoded card and may cast it.

If a creature with an encoded card deals combat damage to more than one player simultaneously (perhaps because some of the combat damage was redirected), the triggered ability will trigger once for each player it deals combat damage to. Each ability will create a copy of the exiled card and allow you to cast it.

foreign_names.name: Seelendämpfe
foreign_names.text:
Ein Spieler deiner Wahl wirft eine Karte aus seiner Hand ab.
Chiffrieren (Dann kannst du diese Zauberspruchkarte auf eine Kreatur codiert, die du kontrollierst, ins Exil schicken. Immer wenn diese Kreatur einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, kann ihr Beherrscher eine Kopie der codierten Karte wirken, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen.)

foreign_names.name: Vapores mentales
foreign_names.text: El jugador objetivo descarta una carta.Cifrar. (Luego puedes exiliar esta carta de hechizo, cifrándola en una criatura que controles. Siempre que esa criatura haga daño de combate a un jugador, su controlador puede lanzar una copia de la carta cifrada sin pagar su coste de maná.)

foreign_names.name: Vapeurs mentales
foreign_names.text:
Le joueur ciblé se défausse d'une carte.
Cryptage (Vous pouvez ensuite exiler cette carte de sort cryptée sur une créature que vous contrôlez. À chaque fois que cette créature inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, son contrôleur peut lancer une copie de la carte cryptée sans payer son coût de mana.)

foreign_names.name: Vapori Mentali
foreign_names.text:
Un giocatore bersaglio scarta una carta.
Cifrare (Poi puoi esiliare questa carta magia codificata su una creatura che controlli. Ogniqualvolta quella creatura infligge danno da combattimento a un giocatore, il suo controllore può lanciare una copia della carta codificata senza pagare il suo costo di mana.)

foreign_names.name: 精神的蒸気
foreign_names.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカードを１枚捨てる。暗号（その後、あなたはあなたがコントロールするクリーチャー１体に暗号化した状態で、この呪文カードを追放してもよい。そのクリーチャーがプレイヤー１人に戦闘ダメージを与えるたび、あなたはその暗号化したカードのコピーを、それのマナ・コストを支払うことなく唱えてもよい。）

foreign_names.name: 정신을 공격하는 증기
foreign_names.text:
플레이어 한 명을 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어는 카드 한 장을 버린다.
암호문 (그런 다음 당신은 이 주문 카드를 추방하고 당신이 조종하는 생물 한 개에 암호화할 수 있다. 그 생물이 플레이어에게 전투피해를 입힐 때마다, 그 생물의 조종자는 암호화한 카드의 복사본을 마나비용의 지불 없이 발동할 수 있다.)

foreign_names.name: Vapores Mentais
foreign_names.text: O jogador alvo descarta um card.Cifrar (Depois, você pode exilar este card de mágica cifrado numa criatura que você controla. Toda vez que aquela criatura causar dano de combate a um jogador, seu controlador poderá conjurar uma cópia do card cifrado sem pagar seu custo de mana.)

foreign_names.name: Испарения Разума
foreign_names.text:
Целевой игрок сбрасывает карту.
Шифр (Затем вы можете изгнать эту карту заклинания, закодировав ее на существе под вашим контролем. Каждый раз, когда то существо наносит боевые повреждения игроку, контролирующий его игрок может разыграть копию закодированной карты без уплаты ее мана-стоимости.)

foreign_names.name: 心灵蒸气
foreign_names.text:
目标牌手弃一张牌。
暗码（然后你可以放逐此咒语牌，并赋码于一个由你操控的生物上。每当该生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，其操控者可以施放所赋码之牌的复制品，且不需支付其法术力费用。）

foreign_names.name: 心靈蒸氣
foreign_names.text:
目標玩家棄一張牌。
暗碼（然後你可以放逐此咒語牌，並賦碼於一個由你操控的生物上。每當該生物對任一玩家造成戰鬥傷害時，其操控者可以施放所賦碼之牌的複製品，且不需支付其魔法力費用。）

foreign_names.name: Mitternächtliche Erholung
foreign_names.text:

Chiffrieren (Dann kannst du diese Zauberspruchkarte auf eine Kreatur codiert, die du kontrollierst, ins Exil schicken. Immer wenn diese Kreatur einem Spieler Kampfschaden zufügt, kann ihr Beherrscher eine Kopie der codierten Karte wirken, ohne ihre Manakosten zu bezahlen.)

foreign_names.name: Recuperación de medianoche
foreign_names.text: Regresa la carta de criatura objetivo de tu cementerio a tu mano.Cifrar. (Luego puedes exiliar esta carta de hechizo, cifrándola en una criatura que controles. foreign_names.text:

Cryptage (Vous pouvez ensuite exiler cette carte de sort cryptée sur une créature que vous contrôlez. À chaque fois que cette créature inflige des blessures de combat à un joueur, son contrôleur peut lancer une copie de la carte cryptée sans payer son coût de mana.)

foreign_names.name: 真夜中の復活

foreign_names.name: 자정의 회수
foreign_names.text:
당신의 무덤에 있는 생물 카드 한 장을 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 당신의 손으로 되돌린다.
